Text:
If you guys need 3D glasses to read this comic you can get a pair cheap here:

http://www.rainbowsymphony.com/freestuff.html

All you gotta do is send a self-addressed stamped envelope. So the whole thing will cost you two postage stamps (one to send, one to receive).

Make sure to write somewhere on the envelope that you want the free Paper Red/Blue 3D glasses. Those are free.
